problem_text: In \triangle A B C, A D and D C are angle bisectors and m \angle B = 76. What is the measure of \angle A D C?
compact_text: In \triangle ABC, AD and DC are angle bisectors and m \angle B = 76. What is the measure of \angle ADC?
annotat_text: In $\triangle ABC$, $\overline{AD}$ and $\overline{DC}$ are angle bisectors and $m \angle B=76$. What is the measure of $\angle ADC $?
